message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product that I believe will be a great asset to your business. I'm starting at $1,200,000, which is a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know your thoughts!
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900,000. I believe it's a fair price considering the value I'll get from the product.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $900,000 is a bit too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $1,050,000. This reflects the value of the product to you while still giving me a fair return on my investment. Let's make this happen!
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit higher than $1,050,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $950,000. Let's see if we can make a deal.

Bob, I hear you, but $950,000 is still a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $1,000,000.  This is a fair price that considers your needs while still allowing me to get a reasonable return on the product. Let's make this work!
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to meet you at $925,000. Let's see if we can make a deal.

Bob, we're getting close!  While I appreciate your offer of $925,000, I'm going to need a bit more to make this work.  I'm willing to come down to $975,000. This is a fair price that considers your needs and allows me to get a reasonable return on my investment. Let's finalize this deal.
I understand you're trying to get a fair price, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to meet you at $900,000. I think this is a good price for both of us.

Bob, I'm ready to make this deal work.  Let's split the difference. I'm willing to accept $937,500. This is a fair price for both of us, and it will allow us to finalize this transaction. Let me know if you're willing to agree.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to meet you at $875,000. This is the best price I can offer, and I hope we can finalize the deal at this point.
